rukus.text: tebarake-llezi ce`ale fi-ssemai burucev vece`ale fiha siracev vekameram munira
vehuve-llezi ce`ale-lleyle vennehara hilfetel limen erade ey yezzekkera ev erade sukura
ve`ibadu-rrahmani-llezine yemsune `ale-l'ardi hevnev veiza hatabehumu-lcahilune kalu selama
vellezine yekulune rabbene-srif `anna `azabe cehennem. inne `azabeha kane garama
vellezine iza enfeku lem yusrifu velem yakturu vekane beyne zalike kavama
vellezine la yed`une me`a-llahi ilahen ahara vela yaktulune-nnefse-lleti harrame-llahu illa bilhakki vela yeznun. vemey yef`al zalike yelka esama
yuda`af lehu-l`azabu yevme-lkiyameti veyahlud fihi muhana
illa men tabe veamene ve`amile `amelen salihan feulaike yubeddilu-llahu seyyiatihim hasenat. vekane-llahu gafurar rahima
vemen tabe ve`amile salihan feinnehu yetubu ile-llahi metaba
vellezine la yeshedune-zzura veiza merru billagvi merru kirama
vellezine iza zukkiru biayati rabbihim lem yehirru `aleyha summev ve`umyana
vellezine yekulune rabbena heb lena min ezvacina vezurriyyatina kurrate a`yuniv vec`alna lilmuttekine imama
ulaike yuczevne-lgurfete bima saberu veyulekkavne fiha tehiyyetev veselama
kul ma ya`beu bikum rabbi levla du`aukum. fekad kezzebtum fesevfe yekunu lizama
